title: Tell me a secret...
body:
[](https://68.media.tumblr.com/fa40a62c96d35b18132e6987a32acf58/tumblr_nhcq17xbNH1u5mhxfo1_1280.jpg)
{{champion:103}} Tell me a secret...
{{champion:104}} Sometimes I try to snort lawn clippings because I miss cigars.
{{champion:103}} Um...
{{champion:86}} Sometimes I have adventures in my bathtub with the Demacian rubber ducky.
{{champion:5}} I use my spear as a back-scratcher sometimes.
{{champion:9}} I stuff crows in my shorts to fulfill my dream of flying.
{{champion:245}} I restarted this conversation several times because I accidentally fell and my face went into your... um... 
{{champion:103}} O_O
######{{champion:245}} Shit this thing is out of juice... maybe if I sneak out...
{{champion:164}} I sometimes play rock-paper-scissors with real paper and rocks, but then my scissors win every time so it gets boring.
{{champion:119}} I flirt with my reflection.
{{champion:84}}  That's not a secret.
{{champion:30}} There are times when I try my hand at pop songs rather than rock music...
{{champion:82}} WHAT?!? Karthus, how could you?!?
{{champion:150}} Shu-nu cabba tobbo-ni-ni kaguda!
{{champion:427}} Gnar, you... you actually... wha... *starts retching*
{{champion:497}} I sometimes throw rocks at birds.
{{champion:498}} You bastard.
{{champion:497}} What? I want to see if I can hit two with one.
{{champion:498}} You're an idiot.
{{champion:497}} Oh, come on, you aren't mad at me, are you?
{{champion:498}} Let's discuss this somewhere else.
{{champion:63}} I sometimes forget I can't drink water and I try.
{{champion:103}} Ok, guys...
{{champion:2}} I occasionally find fleas in my beard.
{{champion:76}} Balls of yarn are my weakness.
{{champion:103}} Guys...
{{champion:107}} My bottom teeth are dentures.
{{champion:17}} I once tried to do a good deed.
{{champion:103}} GUYS!
{{champion:33}} I-
{{champion:103}} Shut up, Rammus!
{{champion:33}} ...ok...
{{champion:53}} How. Could. You. Be. So. Mean? There. There. Rammus.
{{champion:103}} I wasn't asking any of you. How the hell did you even find my house anyway?
{{champion:91}} This is a tree branch outside of Yi's dojo, where he was hosting a party.
{{champion:103}} Anyway, I wasn't asking any of you. I was asking Wukong.
{{champion:62}} Wut.
{{champion:103}} Yes, you.
{{champion:62}} ...what?
{{champion:38}} Ooh, ooh, can I tell my secret? My nether blade actually came from m-
{{champion:103}} Nobody cares, Kassadin.
{{champion:90}} Tough luck, buddy. She's furious.
{{champion:8}} I have a lot of experience with women during these phases.
{{champion:103}} ...get out. All of you, out, OUT!
##_Everyone leaves_
{{champion:103}} ...even you, Teemo.
{{champion:17}} Sh*t.
{{champion:103}} _Sigh_ 
{{champion:36}} _Slurp_
{{champion:103}} AUGH! Wha-what are you still doing here?
{{champion:36}} :D
{{champion:103}} Mundo...
{{champion:36}} :P
{{champion:103}} Mundo, did you not hear me tell everyone to leave-
{{champion:36}} Mundo has secret!
{{champion:103}} _Annoyed groan_ What, is it that you smash things or something? 
{{champion:36}} Mundo remembered something.
{{champion:103}} Cool, I don't care.
{{champion:36}} Mundo remember someone named "mommy." Mommy was nice.
{{champion:103}} _Raises an eyebrow_
{{champion:36}} :)
{{champion:103}} Wait, what?
{{champion:36}} Then Mommy was sad. Mommy told Mundo to be a good boy, then Mundo remember nothing.
{{champion:103}} That's... that's so sad... 
{{champion:36}} Did I say that right?
{{champion:103}} What?
{{champion:27}} Damn it, Mundo, you were doing so great until you blew it.
{{champion:103}} Wait... what?!?
{{champion:27}} Mundo, I think it's time to go.
{{champion:103}} You mean you made all that up?!?
{{champion:36}} _Slurps, then smiles_
{{champion:103}} _Eyes glow in anger_
{{champion:27}} Mundo, get outta there!
{{champion:36}} Huh?
{{champion:3}} HEY, LITTLE PEOPLE! ARE YOU HAVING A PARTY?
{{champion:103}} Agh... I suddenly feel so... tired... _Passes out_
{{champion:3}} Uh-oh.
{{champion:240}} WHAT ARE YA DOIN' ON MY PROPERTY YA DAMN OVERSIZED SKIPPING STONE?!?
{{champion:27}} OK, MUNDO! _NOW_ WE RUN!
{{champion:36}} AGREED! WHOOOO!
{{champion:240}} WHEN I'M DONE WITH YOU YOU'RE GONNA BE ABLE TO BE CREATIVE WITH WHERE YOU EAT FROM AND TAKE A CRAP OUT OF!

Fin

replies.body: {{champion:102}} "I sometimes shout Fus Ro Dah and then shove cheese wheels down the face of a mountain."
"Sweet roll?"
It is from old Skyrim "physics" videos using console commands to spawn cheese wheels or cabbages until the gamrme crashes

I know. I played it lol

I was referencing the ones where they filled the entire town of Whiterun with sweet rolls.
Man I wish I played Skyrim to understand these references. :(
I don't see why shouldn't you. It's a masterpiece of a game although not as difficult as some of the previous ones in the series.
Need to continue the series and eventually cover all the champions.
List your favorite champion and I'll give you a sneak peek.

Straight from my mastery list:
Quinn, Talon, Taric, Janna, Zyra, Braum, Mordekaiser, Leona, Elise, Sejuani, Tahm Kench, Diana, Kalista, Jhin, Varus, Morgana

There's a lot more

{{champion:133}} Sometimes I wear Valor as a hat and pretend like I'm Robin Hood.
{{champion:91}} Occasionally I will use my blades for... c-cooking...
{{champion:44}} Don't tell anybody, but I'm actually wearing a wig.
{{champion:40}} I have seasonal allergies.
{{champion:143}} I'm a vegetarian.
{{champion:201}} Braum sometimes spikes his goat's milk.
{{champion:82}} Karthus and I are going to couples counseling now.
{{champion:89}} I wear sunscreen.
{{champion:60}} I cried furiously at the end of Charlotte's Web... they had to escort me out of the theater.
{{champion:113}} My name is Bristle. The boar is Sejuani.
{{champion:223}} I'm a distant relative of Kermit the Frog. His fame made me jealous and I ate through my grief.
{{champion:131}} I practice my jokes to the moon, and sometimes it laughs with me.
{{champion:429}} I used to bake my bread with stale dough... I adorn my pockets with sweets... armor is actually pleasing to- GET BACK INSIDE ME, INSOLENT SOULS!
{{champion:202}} An artist has no secrets. That's as simple as counting to five... FOUR! I meant four! DAMN IT!
{{champion:110}} I use an aimbot.
{{champion:25}} I don't actually have legs. My skirt covers my lower slug half.

Feen

{{champion:101}} I don't script, I'm just really good.
{{champion:41}} : I'm colourblind and Don't know what colour an orange is
Now I am sad because I can't break the image of Taric wearing a wig from my mind.
Can I see Shen?
That is the only one I have not found yet. Coincidentally.
Isn't the secret the fact that there are many Shens?
The Multi-Shen Theory is science, not gossip.
{{champion:98}} I taunt people by flipping them off mid-air.
{{champion:98}} The reason you're able to see me is because I let the light catch me.
{{champion:14}}: Sometimes I think I'm calling myself the coward when I ult away.
Inb4 he's just yelling "TOWEEEEEEELS!"

{{champion:62}}: ... I don't like bananas .__.

{{champion:103}}:  http://www.kelseyespecially.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/Huh-GIF-Kelsey-Especially.gif

Just force-feed him some.

http://68.media.tumblr.com/b7c29f31043f18cb6685fbec0b97c980/tumblr_o5epg3W03J1uonlmdo1_500.jpg

Wonder what zed would say? 
"I sometimes masturbate to the scream of ADCs begging for mercy." Probably the closes to what he would say.
{{champion:238}} I sleep with a night light.
http://i.imgur.com/bofUVay.gif?noredirect

You should email me your comment folder

{{champion:16}}  Sometimes I heal people who are at full HP,because the pain brings me pleasure . . .
I am very curious on what {{champion:150}}  said. till i get an answer I shall think dirty XD
It is not for the ears of men to witness.
But what if I'm not man? Then am i aloud to hear it?
Lies. There are no women on the internet.
But what if I'm secretly a cat
I fucking love you
I'm so fucking happy you fucking love me. Fucking thank you.
Fucking yeah I fucking love you this is fucking good you fucking awesome person

{{champion:268}}: I have Nasus sing Perfect World from the Emperor's New Groove while I dance to it to cheer up.
No Azir's secret is that he eats at KFC

It's not that bad a secret.

You see, _Expositional babble cut to save reading time._

TL;DR: Azir is a Falcon. Falcons are predatory birds, so it's fine.
This was amazing. Truly wonderful. And Kled makes everything better.
My upvote goes to Kled. That is all.
Vlad... no...
